sections.heading: Disobedience of writ or judgment; contemptA person who fails to comply with the writ of habeas corpus, or with a judgment rendered on a petition for a writ of habeas corpus may be punished for contempt
sections.text: Disobedience of writ or judgment; contemptA person who fails to comply with the writ of habeas corpus, or with a judgment rendered on a petition for a writ of habeas corpus may be punished for contempt.
